summary: The President of the United States of America is the head of state, and head of government of the United States.
full_text: The standard of living in the United States is one of the top 20 in the world by the standards economists use as measures of standards of living. Per capita income is high but also less evenly distributed than in most other developed countries; as a result, the United States fares particularly well in measures of average material well being that do not place weight on equality aspects.
title: Standard of living in the United States
